aima.core.robotics.impl.map

Interface IPoseFactory<P extends IPose2D<P,M>,M extends IMclMove<M>>

  • Type Parameters:
    P - a pose implementing IPose2D.
    M - a movement (or a sequence of movements) implementing IMclMove.

    public interface IPoseFactory<P extends IPose2D<P,M>,M extends IMclMove<M>>
    This interface defines a factory for the class implementing IPose2D in the context of the MclCartesianPlot2D.
    Author:
    Arno von Borries, Jan Phillip Kretzschmar, Andreas Walscheid

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getPose

        P getPose(Point2D point)
        Creates a new instance of <P> for the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        point - the 2D coordinates of the new pose.
        Returns:
        the new pose.

      • getPose

        P getPose(Point2D point,
          double heading)
        Creates a new instance of <P> for the given parameters.
        This function is used to create the result of MclCartesianPlot2D.getAverage().
        Parameters:
        point - the 2D coordinates of the new pose.
        heading - the heading of the pose. This heading may be invalid. Based on the given environment this can be corrected or ignored.
        Returns:
        the new pose.

      • isHeadingValid

        boolean isHeadingValid(P pose)
        Checks whether the heading of a pose is valid.
        Parameters:
        pose - the pose to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the heading is valid.
